title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ben Shapiro & Damani Felder | 7/21/20
description:
“The Right Brothers” founder Damani Felder recounts what he witnessed as Black Lives Matter protesters descended on a restaurant and describes why he can’t stand with them. Ben Shapiro reviews his new book, “How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps,” and why Americans must unite in the face of enemies at our doors. Parody is real as Glenn presents today’s Woke Party Citizen Brief.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
